definitions.definition: someone or something that is not included in a rule, group, or list or that does not behave in the expected way:
examples: Men are usually quite good at map-reading but Tim is the exception.

definitions.definition: to not treat someone or something according to the usual rules:
examples: We don't usually accept late applications, but in this case we will make an exception.

definitions.definition: to be offended or made angry by something or someone:
examples: Why did you take exception to what he said? He was only joking.
